file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-71-02-06 - CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to make sure that the permitted life of the battery installed on the Cockpit Voice Recorder (CVR) is not expired. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CVR ULB BATTERY - GENERAL VISUAL ALL 23-71-02-200-801-A INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-71-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-71-02-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CVR ULB BATTERY - GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to inspect the CVR ULB battery expiration date. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-42-00/100 - CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOV- AMM TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A/400 AL CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSTAL- AMM TASK 23-71-02-400-801-A/400 LATION CMM 23-70-04 - CMM 23-70-44 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Rear fuselage section Ι - right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the Rear Electronic Com- GSE 036 Platform, hydraulic partment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform at the necessary height. (2) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 23-71-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 50 - Apr 29/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Verify the ULB Battery Expiration Date (Figure 601) (Figure 602) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) On the Beacon case, see the date printed to show the battery permitted life. (2) (For aircraft with L3 CVR not installed) If the date is expired, remove the Beacon ( AMM TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A/400) and send it back to the manufacturer for servicing (Refer to CMM 23-70-44). (3) (For aircraft with L3 CVR installed) If the date is expired, remove the Beacon ( AMM TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A/400) and send it back to the manufacturer for servicing (Refer to CMM 23-70-04). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install a new Beacon ( AMM TASK 23-71-02-400-801-A/400). (2) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100). (3) Remove the access platform. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 23-71-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 50 - Apr 29/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
